items.title: Deep Space Anglerfish
items.summary: An anglerfish in a deep space artwork suitable for apparel brand or…
items.content_html:
An anglerfish in a deep space artwork suitable for apparel brand or band merchandise design such as T-shirts, posters, stickers, pins, album covers, etc.

Send message through email or social media platform messaging system on contact page for inquiries and custom illustration works.

Status

Available

Specification

  • 4200 x 6000 px at 300 dpi in raster Photoshop .psd format
  • Each colours laid in separate layers
  • Text and colours can be added or changed

Ownership

It's yours to keep forever and free to use however you want once you've bought it.

items.title: Mechanoid Font
items.summary: Mecha inspired font. I love mecha anime, so I decided to make…
items.content_html:
Mecha inspired font. I love mecha anime, so I decided to make this display font as an effect of watching them numerous times. You can use the font in personal and commercial projects without any cost.

Download Mechanoid font.

Please consider to buy me a coffee if you find this Mechanoid font useful. Your support helps me to create more stuff like this. Thank you.
